code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NumberOfEvents=_ref=>{let{currentNOE,setCurrentNOE,setErrorAlert}=_ref;const[number,setNumber]=useState(currentNOE);const handleInputChanged=event=>{const value=event.target.value;setNumber(value);if(isNaN(value)||value<=0){setErrorAlert('Enter a valid number');}else if(value>32){setErrorAlert('Only maximum of 32 is allowed');}else{setErrorAlert('');setCurrentNOE(value);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"number-of-events",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Number of Events:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:number,onChange:handleInputChanged,"data-testid":"numberOfEventsInput"})]})});};export default NumberOfEvents;
